meta.description: CSH labels for the WEC Map Plugins

languageKey.label: The title of the marker
The description of the marker
Shows the latitude and longitude of the address given.
Lat and long can be changed manually if desired. If the address couldn't be resolved, lat and long won't be available.
This will print out written directions additional to showing the route graphically on the map.
Shows a minimap in the corner for better navigating around the map.
Shows the map type control that can be used to toggle normal, satellite, or hybrid view.
Shows an address form and radius selector that can be used to filter the markers on the map to only show those within the given radius from the given address.
Shows a sidebar with a list of all the markers that, when clicked, will pan and zoom to the marker it corresponds to.
Only shows how many users are in a city instead of showing individual markers. This can be used to protect users' privacy.
Selects which additional KML data should be shown on the map. The information is taken from WEC Map External Resource records.
